title: Years before an all-screen iPhone, Apple imagined an edge-to-edge iPod nano
content:
Introduced in 2005, the iPod nano saw different iterations throughout its life cycle. Now, one of the executives responsible for creating this iPod is showing some of the various mockups created to explore the possibilities of this product since he’s launching a new book called Build: An Unorthodox Guide to Making Things Worth Making.

more…

The post Years before an all-screen iPhone, Apple imagined an edge-to-edge iPod nano appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: One of the executives responsible for creating the iPod nano is showing some of the various mock-ups made before launching this iPod.
